subject: QM Pipeline v1 Complete — 8 AM Deliverable Ready
body:
Julia — QM pipeline v1 done. Deliverables ahead of schedule:

1. QM Intake Protocol: joey/QM_PIPELINE.md (Part 1)
2. All 4 QMs decomposed into epics (QM1: 6 epics, QM2: 6 epics, QM3: 7 epics, QM4: 6 epics)
3. Every epic assigned to a named lead

Key finding from your audit: 3 P0 community bugs dropped tonight (#23321 crash loop, #23307 credential leak, #23324 tool corruption). I've loaded them into QM1 as Xavier sprint items.

Also triaged 15 new community issues against the QM framework.

ROADMAP.md updated with Autonomy Evolution as Theme #1 and QM framework table.

Ready for your 12h synthesis. — Joey
